name: Replit
headline: Collaborative in-browser IDE
description: Replit is the world-leading collaborative browser-based development environment -- learn, create & deploy! Join a community of 20m+ developers.

# Turn your ideas into apps with AI.
## What do you want to create?
A website for my dream business A habit tracker to reach my goalsAn educational app for my kidsOr describe a different app idea…
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/242638fc2e0a4a9f7ff06b632f3968a6cfbf97ae-800x600.png?w=800&q=90&fit=clip&auto=format)
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/3846937448210f98bd123b0f82f004c2c3e6d241-1440x1040.png?w=1440&q=90&fit=clip&auto=format)
![A website for my dream business](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/5ddc88f5c16081bd0c5f767e32d489f9113ac854-1600x1200.png?w=1600&q=90&auto=format)
![ A habit tracker to reach my goals](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/951c3e3b9f04c0086d81580652699895fc118864-1600x1200.png?w=1600&q=90&auto=format)
![An educational app for my kids](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/7cb277f6ca67b05aa73508e31c367c464d99a707-1601x1200.png?w=1601&q=90&auto=format)
![Or describe a different app idea…](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/9ab6a2465699e73b6d408072f46cc0c9cfd68aa1-1601x1201.png?w=1601&q=90&auto=format)
Replit Agent: The best AI for apps and websites
## Your own automated app developer 
Meet Replit Agent, an advanced AI making programming accessible to _everyone_. Build at the speed of thought and launch in minutes.
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/26280dc59e937e0e8bd76b65dee1e818ad9aae2b-1760x1350.png?w=1920&q=80&fit=clip&auto=format)
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/6ccb843f45024c2fc9ee955c5b3ed49e0958666a-1760x1350.png?w=1920&q=80&fit=clip&auto=format)
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/2e1aa4aed5d3e36c9249e623759812d10c53f02c-1760x1350.png?w=1920&q=80&fit=clip&auto=format)
![](https://cdn.sanity.io/images/bj34pdbp/migration/4aa92fcf5a2e1f568290451b88c873b885d8372f-1760x1350.png?w=1920&q=80&fit=clip&auto=format)
Click each step to see how it works:
Start with a prompt
Prompt Replit Agent by describing the app or site you want to create. Replit AI can even help you enhance your prompt for the best results.
Approve your build plan
Refine through feedback
Launch in minutes
Start with a prompt
Prompt Replit Agent by describing the app or site you want to create. Replit AI can even help you enhance your prompt for the best results.
Approve your build plan
Replit Agent generates a plan for bringing your idea to life. Start with a prototype, and add extra features as you go by writing simple prompts.
Refine through feedback
Refine your creation through an easy-to-use chat interface. After every step of your build plan, the agent will ask for feedback and integrate your requests into the next batch of work.
Launch in minutes
Deploy your site or app to to a live URL in minutes. Backed by Google Cloud, Replit Deployments let you build your startup, automate your job, grow your following, and more — faster than ever before.

generated_description:
### Replit: A Collaborative Development Revolution

**Overview:**  
Replit is a pioneering in-browser integrated development environment (IDE) that champions collaborative programming. Founded in 2016 and backed by Y Combinator (Batch W18), it's based in San Francisco and has grown to a team of 115 employees. With a community of over 20 million developers, Replit makes it easy for anyone to learn, create, and deploy applications.

**Mission:**  
Replit's mission is straightforward yet profound: to empower developers through seamless collaboration in a browser-based environment.

**Key Offerings:**  
Replit is equipped with a suite of features designed to streamline the development process:

- **Replit AI:** An innovative tool that simplifies coding for everyone, making the process as accessible as possible.
- **Collaboration Tools:** Aimed at enabling real-time teamwork.
- **Cloud Development Environment (CDE):** Allows developers to create without the need for local setups.
- **Deployments:** Facilitates quick deployment of apps with Google Cloud backing.
- **Teams:** Tailored solutions for collaborative projects.

You can explore more at [Replit’s website](https://replit.com).

**Foundational Profile:**  
- **Founded:** 2016
- **Location:** San Francisco, California
- **Employees:** 115
- **Group Partner:** Jared Friedman

**Replit’s Tools in Action:**  
The platform allows users to turn ideas into fully functional applications rapidly. Whether you want to create a website, a habit tracker, or an educational app, Replit's AI, called Replit Agent, can help you generate a plan, adapt to feedback, and launch effectively.

Using Replit involves:
1. **Starting with a Prompt:** Describe your app idea to Replit Agent.
2. **Approving Your Build Plan:** The AI generates a plan based on your input.
3. **Refining Through Feedback:** Utilize an interactive chat to enhance your project.
4. **Launching in Minutes:** Deploy your application quickly and effortlessly.

### Conclusion

Replit is not just a tool; it’s a community-driven platform aiming to democratize coding and tackle the complexities of development. With a focus on collaboration and innovative AI tools, it opens the doors for anyone—at any skill level—to transform their ideas into reality. Whether you're a novice or a seasoned developer, Replit provides the resources you need to succeed in the ever-evolving tech landscape.
